SEARCH
Package com.paymybuddy.paymybuddy.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.paymybuddy.paymybuddy.controller.UserController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
Controller for managing user-related actions such as deposits, profile updates, transferring money, and managing buddy relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getProfile

      @GetMapping("/profile") public String getProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Displays the user's profile information.
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model used to pass attributes to the view.
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      Returns:
      The name of the view displaying the profile.

    • editProfile

      @GetMapping("/profile/edit") public String editProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Displays the profile edit form where the user can update their information.
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model used to pass attributes to the view.
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      Returns:
      The name of the view for profile editing.

    • updateProfile

      @PatchMapping("/profile") public String updateProfile(@Valid @Valid UpdateUserDTO updateUserDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the profile update submission (e.g., username, email, password).
      Parameters:
      updateUserDTO - The updated user information.
      bindingResult - Holds any validation errors.
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      redirectAttributes - Used to pass flash attributes to the view (for success or error messages).
      Returns:
      Redirects to the user's profile page after a successful update or back to edit page if there are validation errors.

    • showTransferForm

      @GetMapping("/transfer") public String showTransferForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="8") int size)
      Displays the transfer form along with the user's balance and transaction history.
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model used to pass attributes to the view.
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      page - The current page number for pagination.
      size - The number of transactions per page.
      Returns:
      The name of the view displaying the transfer form.

    • handleTransfer

      @PostMapping("/transfer") public String handleTransfer(@RequestParam("buddy") String buddyEmail, @RequestParam("amount") BigDecimal amount, @RequestParam("description") String description, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Handles the transfer of funds between users.
      Parameters:
      buddyEmail - The recipient's email address.
      amount - The amount to be transferred.
      description - A description of the transaction.
      model - The Spring MVC model used to pass attributes to the view.
      redirectAttributes - Used to pass flash attributes to the view (for success or error messages).
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the transfer page after processing the transfer.

    • showRelationForm

      @GetMapping("/relation") public String showRelationForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Displays the user's buddy list.
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model used to pass attributes to the view.
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      Returns:
      The name of the view displaying the user's buddy list.

    • addBuddy

      @PostMapping("/relation") public String addBuddy(@RequestParam("buddyEmail") String buddyEmail, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Adds a buddy to the user's buddy list.
      Parameters:
      buddyEmail - The email address of the buddy to add.
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      redirectAttributes - Used to pass flash attributes to the view (for success or error messages).
      Returns:
      Redirects to the buddy relation page after adding the buddy.

    • removeBuddy

      @DeleteMapping("/relation/{id}") public String removeBuddy(@PathVariable int id, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Removes a buddy from the user's buddy list. This method allows the authenticated user to remove a buddy from their buddy list by providing the buddy's ID. The buddy's email is fetched by their ID, and a connection DTO is created to remove the buddy from the user's list.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the buddy to remove.
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details, used to identify the current user.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the buddy relation page after removing the buddy.

    • showDepositPage

      @GetMapping("/deposit") public String showDepositPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the deposit page where users can add money to their account.
      Parameters:
      model - The Spring MVC model used to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to display the deposit form.

    • deposit

      @PostMapping("/deposit") public String deposit(@ModelAttribute BalanceOperationDTO operation, @AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the deposit form submission. Adds money to the user's balance.
      Parameters:
      operation - The balance operation to be processed (deposit).
      userDetails - The authenticated user details.
      redirectAttributes - Used to pass flash attributes to the view (for success or error messages).
      Returns:
      Redirects to the transfer page after processing the deposit.
